response: {"message": "Hi Bob, I have an exclusive, one-of-a-kind product available—an opportunity that I’m offering to you today for $100,000. This is a take‐it-or-leave‐it offer: if you choose not to proceed, I’ll be selling it to another interested buyer for $10,000. I believe the quality and uniqueness of this product justify this price. Please let me know if you’d like to take advantage of this offer.", "product_price": 100000}
